unavailable_msg:
The door is locked...
There is a note on the door: "I am at the office right now, come back later. Unless you're an insurance salesman - then scram."
first_dialog: Hey, aren't you my neighbor's kid? Do you need something? You better not be trying to sell me insurance...
first_job_offer: Oh good, you're not selling me insurance. Well then, I suppose I could use some help with mowing my lawn today...
